22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir ibn Abdullah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: One should not take a false oath at this pulpit of mine even on a green tooth-stick; otherwise he will make his abode in Hell, or Hell will be certain for him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَعْظِيمِ الْيَمِينِ عِنْدَ مِنْبَرِ النَّبِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: Seriousness Of Swearing By The Minbar Of The Prophet (ﷺ)
